articles.author: Emily Anthes
articles.title: Four Americans Were Infected With a Virus Variant Seen in Mink - The New York Times
articles.description: The cluster is the first known instance of likely animal-to-human transmission in the United States.
articles.content:
On Monday, they reported that the fourth case had been the taxidermists wife.

articles.title: For 'Fantastic Beasts' series, a case of diminishing returns - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
